title: LF Top Laner For Bandit E-sports
body:
Hey guys, just  quick little post for all your High plat- Diamond+ top laners. Currently our LOL team for Bandit E-sports is looking for a solid top laner to join us this season. The daily grind is what we are all about, whether it be scrims, tourneys or game reviews with coaches. We want to expand our image as well as you as a player. So, if you're excited to trial for our roster, please leave a message below or DM my account.

Thank you all and #staylawless guys

_Bandit Hobbs_

replies.body: Hey man, thank you for your interest in our team. We are in fact desperate for a top laner for a upcoming tourney with large prize pool. Could you add the account Zonaq? Thanks heaps
Hey there! I'm a top laner who has been hovering mid diamond in rank for a while now and i am keen to join a team and improve. Added you in the client so hopefully we can talk more about it there.
dam.. almost gold but still so far away
